title: Theobald faces the facts
creator_credit: Cal Dunn Studios, Joe Betzer and Cal Dunn
brief_description: An animated cartoon which presents facts that reveal the inaccuracy of mythical fancies concerning the effects of alcoholic beverages. The film technique used is designed for audience participation.
